about_the_game:
Uncover the truth behind the famous cryptid! The Myth Explorer finally returns with another fascinating investigation "Myth or Reality: Mystery of the Lake DLC" to challenge your detective abilities! You will get the chance to explore additional locations and learn more interesting facts about Loch Ness Monster and its origin, legends and stories. Are you experienced enough to distinguish illusion from reality enough to debunk myths for everyone else? Myths and legends are always captivating with all their secrets and mysteries that we can't wait to unravel!

The gripping adventure continues with the additional content "Myth or Reality: Mystery of the Lake DLC" where you'll be immersed in a mystery about a famous cryptid, brought out by many people, but never found to be true!

🧚‍♀️ EXPLORE THE NESSIE COLLECTION!
It turns out that the owners of the hotel have something resembling a museum dedicated to Nessie, where you can find some curious things…

🧚‍♀️ SNEAK INTO THE MONSTER'S LAIR!
Find a way to discover what's in the collapsed pathway on your way to Nessie's lair. Who knows what lurks in those caves!

🧚‍♀️ VISIT THE PRIVATE MUSEUM OF SCOTLAND!
Having discovered a storehouse of museum pieces, you have to investigate the collection and take photos.

🧚‍♀️ CAREFULLY LISTEN TO THE TOUR!
Sneak into Loch Ness Oceanarium and find an audio tour with important facts!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Learn more details about the suspicious Loch Ness Hotel to prove or disprove a well-known myth and find out what's really going on there.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
